short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count the amount of characters, words, sentences and more by selecting text and right-clicking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple and lightweight addon that will allow you to analyze a text as it adds an option to your menu when you highlight text and right-click.

You will then be redirected to the character counter which will safely and quickly analyze your text and display the results to you.

For your privacy - the text is sent over client-side (e.g https://www.charactercountonline.com/#text:HelloWorld).

I hope this addon will help you out and all your feedback and comments are much appreciated and will be used to improve the addon.

Thanks to HagGeowanni as the source code was inspired by his awesome Google Image Search addon!
